info.name: GoogleBar only on hover
info.description:
Made from:
http://userstyles.org/styles/23064 by turl

Makes the google bar only appear on hover instead of fading in. Also makes background of it transparent so it goes with your other google styles.

Edit: Added "div[class="fade"]{background-image:none!important;
background-color:transparent!important;}" so adds don't mess with other styles.
